projects.title: NOEMIA DELIVERY
projects.about: Here you can order an experience of eating a gourmet pizza with a good wine after a delicious starter.

projects.title: ESPORT NLW
projects.about: Here you can create an ad to find your partner to play your favorite game. Building with React, React Native and more.

projects.title: POKEDEX APP
projects.about: Pokedex made with a PokeApi. The application allows the user to see the pokemon in detail, also having the possibility to search for the pokemon he wants.

projects.title: STER CRYPTO
projects.about: SterCrypto is a template for a responsive NFT marketplace, build your marketplace and build a great experience for your users. It is built with NextJs and Chakra

projects.title: NEXT STARTER
projects.about: Simple Starter for Next JS 12+, Chakra UI 2+ and TypeScript, an alias is already set up too! Clone this project and use it to create your own Next.js project.

projects.title: INTEGRE 10 ANOS
projects.about: Interactive page with several games such as tic-tac-toe, made in React-js to celebrate 10 years of the best marketing agency, Agência Integra.

projects.title: GOAT BEAT
projects.about: A “DJ” table with goats, is a play with HTML, CSS and JavaScript to learn pure JavaScript functions. Start now!

projects.title: POST DO IT
projects.about: What is Post-do-it? is an application to create 'post-is' to remember what you have to do, and everything, always with a hint of humor.

projects.title: BORDER BEAUTY
projects.about: Make your own custom div, with width, height, background and more. When you get your perfect div you will get some CSS to add to your code

projects.title: MY WEDDING
projects.about: This is my wedding website, which I created to centralize gift links and a guest list.
